text: Foolad Arena is a football stadium in Ahvaz, Iran which hosts the Foolad Youth Academy and Foolad Novin, the clubs B team. The stadium was inaugurated in 2007. ==References== ==External links== * Foolad F.C. Official Website Category:Sport in Ahvaz Category:Buildings and structures in Khuzestan Province Category:Football venues in Iran
title: Foolad Khuzestan Stadium
